content.rendered:
Directed by Rajesh Krishnan

Written by Rajesh Krishnan. Kapil Sawant. Kapil Sawant. Rajesh Krishnan

Cast Kunal Kemmu (Nandan Kumar (as Kunal Khemu)). Rasika Dugal (Lata Kumar). Vijay Raaz (Gangster Bala Rathod). Ranvir Shorey (Inspector Madhav Kolte). Gajraj Rao (MLA D. N. Patil). Aryan Prajapati (Ayush Kumar). Aakash Dabhade (Graduate). Sumit Nijhawan (Omar Siddiqui). Nilesh Divekar (Rajan Singh). Shashi Ranjan (Abdul). Atul Todankar (Subhash Pandey (MLA Patil’s PA)). Ghanshyam Garg (Ramlal). Vijay Nikam (Vasant Goenka). Manuj Sharma (Faizu). Siddhesh Purkar (Damodar). Deepesh Sharma (Sudhir). Hemant Soni (Mukesh Bhai). Sada Yadav (Balu). Sonu Ronjhiya (Vignesh). Tariq Ahmed Khan (Mushtaq). Sachin Naik (Nosy Auto Driver). Preeti Sharma (Real Estate Salesperson). Jitendra Vashishth (Teller Yogender Vashisht). Ankush Deshmukh (Teller Ranjan D’Souza). Narottam Bain (Watchman Surya Tiwari). Deepak Ramesh (Piyush Mishra). Dinesh Lamba (Suresh). Digvijay (Jameel). Neelima Azim (Shobha (MLA Patil’s Wife) (as Neelima)). Himanshu Sharma (Supermanav). Raj Shekhar Chandra (Police Constable 1). Anand Alkunte (Police Constable 2). Sanjay Vichare (Police Constable 3). Nitin Bhajan (Auto Driver 1). Avinash Kuri (Auto Driver 2). Chandra Vashisht (Auto Driver 3). Bhupendra Singh (Goon 1). Wilson Tiger (Goon 2). Sachin Shetty (Goon 3). Ankush Bhai (Goon 4). Himanshu (Goon 5). Surender Thakur (Goon 6). Prasad Badwe (MC V. Prakash). Ishaan Rai (Sketch Artist). Rajesh Krishnan (Classical Singer). Dhawal Tandon (Sitar Player). Surendra Belbansi (Tabla Player). Devanand Gandharva (Harmonium Player). Bhopendra Belbansi (Jal Tarang Player). Saurab (Reporter). Aaroosh Kohli (Photographer). Rutuja (News Anchor 1). Tripti (News Anchor 2). Ninad Kamat (Narration (voice)). Rachit Jadoun (Dhaani).Sujeet Kumar Sharma. Deepesh Sumitra Jagdish (Sudhir (uncredited)). Sachin Nayak (Keshav Prajapati (uncredited))

Languages Hindi

Producers Prasanna R. Coondapur. Ameya Dahibavkar. Aaroosh Kohli. Rucha Pathak. Rajesh H. Shah. Shantanu Tungare

Production Fox STAR Studio. Soda Film. Spotless Film
